turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Michelle, I would like to order some Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hey James, What location are you looking to get some coffee

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, Im over at the PacMutual Building Downtown, so the Starbuck on the corner or Grand and 6th Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it! Are you just getting something to drink or also some food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both today. Im starving. Lets go with Hot Caramel Macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size Macchiato and do you need some milk and added flavoring?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go with a Venti sized, a little Coconut milk and also extra extra of caramel drizzle for effect

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's quite a drink Sir! And you said something about food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'll get a Lemon Loaf and I'll also have a Cherry Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What size is the Cherry Mocha and any milk in this one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll get a Grande for that drink and 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem sir. Any added drinks for today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I might need another Espresso

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size and how many shots of Espresso are we talking about?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have 8 shots Espresso in a Venti cup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any added milk for that Venti to make up for space?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Fill the rest of the cup up with 2% milk and extra top of whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. If that is all i'll make up this order for Starbucks on the corner of 6th street and Grand in downtown Los Angeles

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That will be all. Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem, Sir. Have a good day. The order will be ready under your name James McDonald
